Articles.Content:
I always thought I was bad at making planes. Until I made a plane that could fly pretty good:

Javascript is disabled. View full album

This craft uses LLL and B9

Flight characteristics:

- very short landing and takeoff (about three or four times the aircraft's length)

- It takes off almost automatically at ~30-40m/s

- has a max. speed of ~220m/s with the air-breathing mode and >300m/s with the rocket mode

- very good glider until you get below 25m/s

- best landing speed between 25-40m/s (has airbrakes to help you slowing down, use them with action group 2 and 3)

- can't really make orbit, so use the rocket mode only for speed or when you don't have oxygen.

find it out yourself!

download: MediaFire or Curse

Edited June 21, 2014 by ExtremeTrader
You can even land this thing on the VAB, if you have extreme flying skills! Please send me pictures if you managed to do so!
